CodeList.Name: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 Questionnaire Test Name

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your social activities?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Time Physical Health or Emotional Problems Interfere With Social Activities

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: R3601-Did Pain Interfere With Your Work
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: R3601-Did Pain Interfere With Your Work
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, how much did pain interfere with your normal work?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Pain Interfere With Normal Work

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: R3601-Did You Feel Full of Pep
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: R3601-Did You Feel Full of Pep
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Did you feel full of pep?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Feel Full of Pep

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Did you feel tired?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Feel Tired

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Did you feel worn out?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Feel Worn Out

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: R3601-Did You Have a Lot of Energy
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: R3601-Did You Have a Lot of Energy
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Did you have a lot of energy?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Have a Lot of Energy

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems: Accomplished less than you would like.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Emotional Problem Accomplished Less

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems: Cut down the amount of time you spent on work or other activities.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Emotional Problem Cut Down Time Spent on Work

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems: Didn't do work or other activities as carefully as usual.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Emotional Problem Did Not Do Work as Carefully

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your normal social activities with family, friends, neighbors, or groups?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Extend Physical Health or Emotional Problems Interfere With Social Activities

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: R3601-Get Sick Easier Than Other People
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: R3601-Get Sick Easier Than Other People
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How TRUE or FALSE is each of the following statements for you: I seem to get sick a little easier than other people.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Get Sick Easier Than Other

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: R3601-Have Been a Very Nervous Person
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: R3601-Have Been a Very Nervous Person
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you been a very nervous person?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Been a Nervous Person

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you felt downhearted and blue?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Felt Downhearted and Blue

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: R3601-Have Felt So Down in the Dumps
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: R3601-Have Felt So Down in the Dumps
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer you up?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Felt Nothing Could Cheer You Up

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: R3601-Have You Been a Happy Person
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: R3601-Have You Been a Happy Person
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you been a happy person?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Been a Happy Person

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: R3601-Have You Felt Calm and Peaceful
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: R3601-Have You Felt Calm and Peaceful
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you felt calm and peaceful?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Felt Calm and Peaceful

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Bathing or dressing yourself.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Health Limit Bathing or Dressing

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Bending, kneeling, or stooping.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Health Limit Bending or Stooping

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Lifting or carrying groceries.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Health Limit Lifting Groceries

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Climbing one flight of stairs.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Health Limit Climbing One Flight

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Climbing several flights of stairs.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Health Limit Climbing Several Flights

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Moderate activities, such as moving a table, pushing a vacuum cleaner, bowling, or playing golf.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Health Limit Moderate Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Vigorous activities, such as running, lifting heavy objects, participating in strenuous sports.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Health Limit Vigorous Activities

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: R3601-Health Limit Walk More Than Mile
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: R3601-Health Limit Walk More Than Mile
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Walking more than a mile.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Health Limit Walking More Than A Mile

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Walking one block.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Health Limit Walking One Block

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Does your health now limit you in these activities: Walking several blocks.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Health Limit Walking Several Blocks

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: R3601-Health Now Compared to 1 Year Ago
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: R3601-Health Now Compared to 1 Year Ago
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - Compared to one year ago, how would you rate your health in general now?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Rate Your Health Compared to One Year Ago

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: R3601-How Much Bodily Pain Have You Had
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: R3601-How Much Bodily Pain Have You Had
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How much bodily pain have you had during the past 4 weeks?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Bodily Pain

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: R3601-I Am as Healthy as Anybody I Know
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: R3601-I Am as Healthy as Anybody I Know
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How TRUE or FALSE is each of the following statements for you: I am as healthy as anybody I know.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - As Healthy as Anybody

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: R3601-I Expect My Health to Get Worse
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: R3601-I Expect My Health to Get Worse
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How TRUE or FALSE is each of the following statements for you: I expect my health to get worse.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Expect Health to Get Worse

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - How TRUE or FALSE is each of the following statements for you: My health is excellent.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - My Health is Excellent

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health: Accomplished less than you would like.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Physical Health Accomplished Less

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health: Cut down the amount of time you spent on work or other activities.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Physical Health Cut Down Time Spent on Work

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health: Had difficulty performing the work or other activities.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Physical Health Difficulty Performing Work

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: R3601-Phys Health: Limit Kind of Work
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: R3601-Phys Health: Limit Kind of Work
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health: Were limited in the kind of work or other activities.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Physical Health Limited in the Kind of Work

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: R3601-Would You Say Your Health Is
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: R3601-Would You Say Your Health Is
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 - In general, would you say your health is:
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: RAND-36 - Rate Your Health

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 Questionnaire Test Name
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire RAND 36-Item Health Survey 1.0 Test Name Terminology
